collectOptions

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> collectOptions(java.util.Collection<?> items,
                                                                              java.lang.String itemValueProperty,
                                                                              java.lang.String itemLabelProperty,
                                                                              java.lang.String blankValue)
Creates and options map using the same principles as spring's form:options tag.

Parameters:
items - A collection of items that should make up the options. The options will be in the same iteration order as this collection.
itemValueProperty - The property of the collection's elements which should be used as as the submitted value for each item. If null, the result of item.toString() will be used instead.
itemLabelProperty - The property of the collection's elements which should be used as as the displayed label for each item. If null, the result of item.toString() will be used instead.
Returns:
an options map suitable for use as the InputField.OPTIONS attribute

collectCustomOptions

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> collectCustomOptions(java.util.Collection<?> items,
                                                                                    java.lang.String itemValueProperty,
                                                                                    java.lang.String itemLabel1Property,
                                                                                    java.lang.String itemLabel2Property,
                                                                                    java.lang.String separator)
Creates and options map using the same principles as spring's form:options tag.

Parameters:
items - A collection of items that should make up the options. The options will be in the same iteration order as this collection.
itemValueProperty - The property of the collection's elements which should be used as as the submitted value for each item. If null, the result of item.toString() will be used instead.
itemLabel1Property - The property of the collection's elements which should be used as as the displayed label for each item before the separator. If null, the result of item.toString() will be used instead.
itemLabel2Property - The property of the collection's elements which should be used as as the displayed label for each item after the separator. If null, the result of item.toString() will be used instead.
separator - The string that separates label1 and label2 property.
items -
itemValueProperty -
itemLabel1Property -
itemLabel2Property -
separator -
Returns:
